question: Which Indian state has announced to set up the country’s biggest film city?
explanation:
Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath has recently announced to set up the country’s biggest film city.
The biggest and the grandest film city of the country in Gautam Buddh Nagar. He also directed the state officials to search for a suitable land in or around Noida, Greater Noida or Yamuna Expressway, for construction.
